title: Chris King GRD23 gravel & MTN30 MTB wheels debut w/ USA-made carbon rims
content:
Chris King is rolling out all-new complete wheels built on thermoplastic-based carbon fiber rims that are made in the US. The designs are modernly wide, hookless and tubeless, but it’s what’s holding the fibers together that make their new rims unique. Using FusionFiber rims made in Utah, the carbon plies are bonded together with a thermoplastic

The post Chris King GRD23 gravel & MTN30 MTB wheels debut w/ USA-made carbon rims appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
